title: How to add a picture into posts?
body: Would help a lot as I want to be able to meme more.

replies.body:
There's no attachment feature on the boards, so you'll want upload it and post the link.  It should auto generate.

http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/07/07185232572bc8e4dfd368b17bd27facea8bf3ee725edbf4bc9775aa0f8b1014.jpg
How do you upload things btw?
You can use any image uploading site, like Imgur!
Thank you once again! You guys are the best!
